content.text:
Match each gene with the corresponding mouse strain and publication.

 Instructions: For each gene in Column A, match it with the correct mouse strain from Column B and the corresponding publication DOI from Column C.

Column A (Gene)	Column B (Mouse Strain)	Column C (DOI)
1. ADCY5	A. C57BL/6 Ã— 129/SvEv	i. 10.1073/pnas.1516131112
2. AGTR1	B. NMRI	ii. 10.1111/acel.12401
3. BUB1B	C. T7	iii. 10.1172/JCI36703
4. HSPA1A	D. wild type	iv. 10.1038/ncb2643
Your answers (example format): 1Di,2Biv
